properties.areaDesc: Bradley, AR; Ashley, AR; Cleveland, AR; Drew, AR
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 7:47PM CST until February 19 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a Flood
Advisory for the following river location in Arkansas...

Saline River Near Rye affecting Ashley...Bradley...Cleveland and
Drew Counties


River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall
forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of
flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall
forecasts.

Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our
Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at...
www.weather.gov/lzk
Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.

The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Saline River Near Rye.
* until Wednesday afternoon.
* At  7:15 PM Tuesday the stage was 24.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 26.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is forecast to slowly fall, although additional rainfall
is expected so continue monitoring the latest forecasts.



Fld     Observed        Forecast 6 AM        Crest
Location     Stg   Stg  Day Time   Wed   Thu   Fri  Crest Time  Date

Saline River
Rye         26  24.3 Tue 07 PM  24.4  24.4  24.3     SLOWLY FALLING
